contentrichtext.text: {{Italictitle}} {{Taxobox | name = ''Ptychozoon'' | image = Ptychozoon kuhli.jpg | image_width = 240px | image_caption = ''[[Ptychozoon kuhli]]'' | regnum = [[Animal]]ia | phylum = [[Chordate|Chordata]] | classis = [[Reptile|Reptilia]] | ordo = [[Squamata]] | familia = [[Gekkonidae]] | subfamilia = [[Gekkoninae]] | genus = '''''Ptychozoon''''' }} '''Ptychozoon''' is a [[genus]] of [[arboreal]] [[gecko]] from [[Southeast Asia]], known as '''Flying Geckos''' or '''Parachute Geckos'''.<ref name="RM">Malkmas et al. ''Amphibians & Reptiles of Mount Kinabalu (North Borneo).'' Germany: A.R.G., 2002. 32, 267-268.</ref> They are characterized by cryptic coloration and elaborate webs surrounding the neck, limbs, trunk, and tail.<ref name="RM"/> These [[Biological membrane|membrane]]s help to conceal the gecko against trees. When the gecko leaps into the air, the flaps are used to generate lift and allow the gecko to control its fall. It can fly up to 200 feet (60 meters). Also it does a swoop at the end of its flight to land softly. A similar adaptation is found in the gecko ''[[Cosymbotus]]''. There are six described species in this genus. They are often kept as pets. ==Classification of genus ''Ptychozoon''== *Horsfield's Flying Gecko, ''[[Ptychozoon horsfieldii]]'' *Intermediate Flying Gecko <small>or Philippine Parachute Gecko</small>, ''[[Ptychozoon intermedium]]'' <small>Taylor, 1915</small> *Kaeng Krachan Parachute Gecko, ''[[Ptychozoon kaengkrachanense]]'' <small>Sumontha, Pauwels, Kunya, Limlikhitaksorn, Ruksue, Taokratok, Ansermet, & Chanhome, 2012</small> *Kuhl's Flying Gecko, ''[[Ptychozoon kuhli]]'' <small>Stejneger, 1902</small> *Smooth-backed Gliding Gecko, ''[[Ptychozoon lionotum]]'' <small>(Annandale, 1905)</small> *Sabah Flying Gecko, ''[[Ptychozoon rhacophorus]]'' <small>Boulenger, 1899</small> *Three-banded Parachute Gecko, ''[[Ptychozoon trinotaterra]]'' <small>Brown, 1999</small> ==References== {{reflist}} *[http://www.gekkota.com/html/ptychozoon_sp_.html Global Gecko Association] [[Category:Geckos]] [[Category:Gliding animals]] {{Gecko-stub}} For sale here http://www.reptilesncritters.com/flying-gecko.html http://www.undergroundreptiles.com/an.html
